# INRidesharingDomainHandling

**Protocol**

An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the ride-booking domain.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol INRidesharingDomainHandling : INCancelRideIntentHandling, INGetRideStatusIntentHandling, INListRideOptionsIntentHandling, INRequestRideIntentHandling, INSendRideFeedbackIntentHandling
```

```swift
protocol INRidesharingDomainHandling : INGetRideStatusIntentHandling, INListRideOptionsIntentHandling, INRequestRideIntentHandling
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRidesharingDomainHandling] protocol is a convenience protocol that adopts all of the protocols used to handle ride sharing-related intents. When your app adopts all of the protocols associated with ride sharing, you can adopt this one protocol instead of adopting the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INListRideOptionsIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRequestRideIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetRideStatusIntentHandling], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelRideIntentHandling], and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendRideFeedbackIntentHandling] protocols separately.

An object that adopts this protocol must be able to respond to the following intents:

- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INListRideOptionsIntent], a request to view the available vehicles and prices.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRequestRideIntent], a request to book a ride.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetRideStatusIntent], a request to get the status of a previously booked ride.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelRideIntent], a request to cancel the currently active ride.
- [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSendRideFeedbackIntent], a request to record feedback for the just-completed ride.

Your handler object must be prepared to resolve any parameters associated with these intents and to confirm and handle the requests. When confirming and handling a request, you provide the response object that matches the specified intent.

## Domain-Handling Protocols

- **INMessagesDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the messages domain.
- **INNotebookDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the lists and notes domain.
- **INWorkoutsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the workouts domain.
- **INPaymentsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the payments domain.
- **INCallsDomainHandling**: Provides a convenient way to adopt all of the protocols in the VoIP calling domain.
- **INVisualCodeDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the visual codes domain.
- **INPhotosDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the photos domain.
- **INCarCommandsDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all the handling protocols in the car commands domain.
- **INCarPlayDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the CarPlay domain.
- **INRadioDomainHandling**: An interface for adopting all of the protocols in the radio domain.

## Inherits From

- INCancelRideIntentHandling
- INGetRideStatusIntentHandling
- INListRideOptionsIntentHandling
- INRequestRideIntentHandling
- INSendRideFeedbackIntentHandling
- NSObjectProtocol
